keyPoints: Covers hospitalization and outpatient treatments
Cashless facility at 4500+ network hospitals
Includes maternity cover after 3 years
details: The Health Shield Plan by Apollo India is designed to cover both hospitalization and outpatient treatments. It includes pre and post-hospitalization expenses for 60 days and 90 days respectively. Daycare procedures, which do not require 24-hour hospitalization, are also covered. The policy offers a cashless facility across 4500+ network hospitals in India. In addition, the plan includes maternity cover after a waiting period of 3 years, along with coverage for newborn babies. Free annual health check-ups are also part of the package, ensuring you can stay on top of your health.

keyPoints: Covers pre and post-hospitalization expenses
Cashless treatment at 5000+ hospitals
Includes ambulance charges and daycare surgeries
details: The Health Companion plan from Max Bupa is a comprehensive health insurance plan designed for individuals and families. It covers hospitalization costs, including pre and post-hospitalization expenses, for up to 10 Lakhs. The plan offers cashless treatment at over 5000 hospitals nationwide. With coverage for ambulance charges, daycare surgeries, and domiciliary hospitalization, this plan ensures a wide range of medical contingencies are addressed. The family floater option allows multiple family members to be covered under one plan, making it an ideal solution for families. Critical illness coverage and cancer treatment are also included.

keyPoints: Covers hospitalization and critical illnesses
Includes maternity benefits and newborn care
Free telemedicine consultations
details: Star Family Health Optima is an all-inclusive family health insurance plan offering coverage of up to 25 Lakhs. This plan covers hospitalization expenses, including pre and post-hospitalization for a specified period. The policy also provides coverage for daycare treatments and advanced procedures, such as robotic surgeries. Coverage extends to critical illnesses like cancer, kidney failure, and heart attacks. The policy includes maternity benefits after a specified waiting period and provides care for newborn babies. Star Health also offers free telemedicine consultations, making healthcare access easier and more convenient.

keyPoints: Extensive coverage including organ donor expenses
No-claim bonus feature increases coverage annually
Global coverage for medical emergencies
details: Religare Care Plan offers extensive health coverage for individuals and families, providing up to 50 Lakhs in claims. This plan covers hospitalization, daycare procedures, critical illnesses, and even organ donor expenses. The policy includes a no-claim bonus feature, which increases the coverage amount each year if no claim is made. The Religare Care Plan offers global coverage for medical emergencies and also includes an annual health check-up. The plan is known for its cashless claim settlements at more than 7000 hospitals in India, making it one of the most flexible and robust health plans available.

keyPoints: Covers advanced medical procedures and critical illnesses
Includes AYUSH treatments
Global coverage and second opinion for critical illnesses
details: HDFC ERGO Health Suraksha is a premium health insurance plan offering up to 1 Crore in coverage. The plan covers hospitalization costs, critical illness treatment, cancer therapies, and advanced medical procedures like robotic surgeries. It includes coverage for pre and post-hospitalization expenses, daycare treatments, and even global coverage for treatments. With this plan, you also get a range of add-ons, such as coverage for alternative treatments like Ayurveda, Unani, Siddha, and Homeopathy (AYUSH). The policy also provides a second opinion for critical illnesses and offers cashless treatments across an extensive hospital network.

keyPoints: Covers pre-existing diseases after 4 years
Includes maternity expenses
Network of over 6500 hospitals
details: The Health Secure Plan provides comprehensive health coverage with cashless hospitalization, coverage for pre-existing diseases after 4 years, and a network of over 6500 hospitals. It includes coverage for maternity expenses and annual health check-ups.

keyPoints: Covers pre and post-hospitalization
Includes maternity and newborn care
Covers ambulance charges and day care procedures
details: This plan offers extensive coverage including pre and post hospitalization, maternity, and newborn care. The policy also covers ambulance charges, day care procedures, and provides lifelong renewability.

keyPoints: Covers hospitalization and pre-existing diseases after 2 years
Optional critical illness cover
Cashless treatment at 4500+ hospitals
details: Max Bupa Reassure is a comprehensive plan covering hospitalization, pre-existing diseases after 2 years, and offers an optional critical illness cover. The plan provides cashless treatment across 4500+ hospitals.

keyPoints: Covers COVID-19 and critical illnesses
Includes wellness program and renewal discounts
Comprehensive health benefits
details: The Care Health Insurance plan offers coverage for COVID-19, critical illness, and comprehensive health benefits including pre and post-hospitalization expenses. The plan also provides a wellness program and discounts on renewal.

details: This family floater plan covers all members under one policy, with comprehensive coverage for critical illnesses, maternity expenses, and day care procedures. The plan provides lifetime renewability and includes free health check-ups.

details: ICICI Lombardâ€™s Complete Health plan offers extensive coverage with cashless hospitalization, wellness services, and additional features like critical illness cover. The policy covers over 400 day care treatments.

details: Tata AIG MediCare provides broad health coverage including critical illnesses, hospitalization, and post-discharge expenses. The plan covers over 5000 hospitals across India with cashless treatment facilities.
